alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 8:41PM PST until January 17 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches in the Methow Valley. Mazama total snow accumulations as high as 10 inches. * WHERE...Conconully, Winthrop, Methow, Loup Loup Pass, Mazama, and Twisp. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
